creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: covered tureen with insert; handles attached at body with leaf design; rope banding at rim, foot and top of cover; crest at sides of cover and tureen body, tureen has a shield with two standing bulls, cover has a deer head and an arm holding a sceptor, deer at side of insert
markings: [bust], \'N\', [crowned head], [lion], \'RS\' on foot; [lion], [crowned head], \'R\', [bust], \'I(?)R\' at short side of insert with \'L8799\' hand etched above; [bust], [lion], \'RS\' at side of rim on cover; \'FUMUS\' at side of cover associated with crest; \'L8799\' etched at interior of cover at center; \'Craufued to Bruce\'/\'DO WELL AND DOUST NOT\' associated with crest at one side of tureen; \'TATUM TE ROBORE REDDAM\' on other side of tureen associated with crest; \'No,1 115,,12\' hand etched under foot of tureen; [lion] at end tip of cover handle
title: Covered tureen
